message.entry: N must be set to two for a logical image.
The input image must be uint8, uint16, double, or logical.
An indexed image can be uint8, uint16, double, single, or logical.
Second argument must be a colormap or a positive integer.
If input is a binary image then N must be a scalar constant of value 2.
Function imhist does not support histogram display in code generation.
The length of the colormap should be >= the maximum value in the indexed image.
